name: GTOPO30 c/c++ function library
short_description: A collection of portable functions, written in c, (compiles in c++) for using the GTOPO30 digital elevation model (GTOPO30 DEM). Including a comprehensive terminal client, height using bilinear interpolation, create DEM bitmaps, RLE tile combined data.
